Material Concept Store
By establishing the material concept store Jeantopia, we classify materials into ten categories. With over 30,000 items, Jeantopia becomes the utopia of designers.
Professional Technology
Material Categories
All materials have passed professional laboratory tests to ensure none of the following eight heavy metals and toxic substances are contained.Eight heavy metals: lead (Pb), arsenic (As), stibium (Sb), barium (Ba), cadmium (Cd), chromium (Cr), mercury (Hg), selenium (Se).
Organized Management
There are numerous materials managed by the Jeancard ERP system. Special staff is assigned to create files for the specifications, unit price and procurement profile of each material. Materials are traced and replenished every week and inventoried periodically to maintain the material database in order to accurately calculate materials. From design through development to manufacture, material costs are clearly controlled and quality is stabilized to ensure high product quality.
